channel.title: In need of help about 508 server
channel.description:
Hey everyone. I`m actually wanting to add some things to my server which are:
::item command but people could only spawn some things and not dclaws, phats and money,... (i don`t know if i have to put if (cmd[0].startsWith("item 11694")) p.rights >= 2 for Ags case or something else...) :)
I wanted to add spells such as Energy transfer, heal other, heal group and veng other ( basically just these ) but i don`t even know how to start coding that. :confused:
Add ::1hp command and ::killme or ::die commands. :rolleyes:
::demote which i tried to make following a guide at youtube but DIDN`T work. :(
and last one ::alltome which isn`t working too. :(
I know you all might say ``wow you wan`t too much ...´´ but actually that`s all i need to do so i can get my server the way i wan`t. Anything is accepted, any little help, ANYTHING is really really REALLY apreciated. :D
Thanks, Br.

item.title: In need of help about 508 server
item.dc:creator: @Brazil_pkr10 Brazil pkr10
item.description:
@Brazil_pkr10 wrote:

Hey everyone. I`m actually wanting to add some things to my server which are:

::item command but people could only spawn some things and not dclaws, phats and money,… (i don`t know if i have to put if (cmd[0].startsWith(“item 11694”)) p.rights >= 2 for Ags case or something else…)

I wanted to add spells such as Energy transfer, heal other, heal group and veng other ( basically just these ) but i don`t even know how to start coding that.

Add ::1hp command and ::killme or ::die commands. :rolleyes:

::demote which i tried to make following a guide at youtube but DIDN`T work.

and last one ::alltome which isn`t working too.

I know you all might say ``wow you want too much ...´´ but actually thats all i need to do so i can get my server the way i wan`t. Anything is accepted, any little help, ANYTHING is really really REALLY apreciated.

Thanks, Br.
